description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Happy Fun Time Friends have descended on to your XBOX and bring with them joy and fun for all ages. Guide your Happy Dots around the levels and visit all of the friends! Charlie the Cactus and Susie Sunflower are ready to brighten your day with fun and excitement. Only 80 MSP and fun for the whole family.
